name: Lawn In 60 Seconds
description:
Try clearing the lot within the 60 second limit!
A quick lawn mowing simulator made for #LOWREZJAM

Controls:
Run the mower using one of two speeds, the slower speed allows for tighter turns, but go fast enough to mow the entire lawn within the 60 second limit.

CONTROLDESCRIPTIONxGo  Faster  - Wider Turning Radiuso
Go Slower - Tighter Turning Radius←Steer Left→Steer Right
